Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Duration: 30 minutesÂ  Ingredients:
  • Jowar flour / sorghum flour - 240 grams
  • Hot Water ( Boiled) - 1/2 cup - 120 ml
  • Salt - 3/4 teaspoon
  • Green chillies - 4 - finely chopped
  • Ajwain / vaamu - 1/4 teaspoon
  • Cumin/ Jeera seeds - 1/2 teaspoon
  • Sesame seeds ( White ) - 1 teaspoon
  • Cilantro - 1/4 cup chopped
  • Carrot - grated - 1/4 cup
  • Bottled Gourd- Peeled off & grated - 1/2 cup
  • White onion - chopped - 1/3 cup
  • Coconut oil - To cook rotiâ€™s - 1 tb sp
Procedure:
  • In a wide bowl add flour, chopped & grated veggies , chillies, salt, cumin, Ajwain, sesame seeds
  • First, dry mix all ingredients and then add water then mix with a spoon or spatula because we are using hot water
  • Form a dough and divide it into 6 equal portions
  • Heat a tava on medium heat and make roti by applying oil on butter paper or on paper banana leaf
  • Tap the dough on sheet, make into round by dipping fingers in water( as shown in below pictures)
  • Add oil on tava and flip the sheet on it, let it sit for about half minute and gently remove sheet on tava, repeat the process to make other rotiâ€™s
  • Cook both sides by adding oil and till you see brown spots on it
  • It pairs with raw onion or pickle or curd and cucumber
